mapper.select: select it.id AS idItem, it.nombre AS nombreItem , it.descripcion AS itemDescripcion , it.fechalanzamiento , it.tarifaxdia , it.formatorenta , it.genero, ti.id AS idTipoItem , ti.descripcion AS tipoItemDescripcion FROM VI_ITEMS as it left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on it.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id

select it.id AS idItem, it.nombre AS nombreItem , it.descripcion AS itemDescripcion , it.fechalanzamiento , it.tarifaxdia , it.formatorenta , it.genero , ti.id AS idTipoItem , ti.descripcion AS tipoItemDescripcion FROM VI_ITEMS as it left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on it.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id WHERE it.id = #{iid}

select ir.id AS idItemRentado , ir.fechainiciorenta , ir.fechafinrenta , i.id AS idItem, i.nombre AS nombreItem , i.descripcion AS itemDescripcion , i.fechalanzamiento , i.tarifaxdia , i.formatorenta , i.genero FROM VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir right join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id where ir.ITEMS_id is null
